page.title: 10WHERE PEOPLE SHOP
page.content: We asked people from 50 houses in the block where they went{shopping.}Some shopped in more than 1 place. They said:Cirencester 38,Tetbury 18,Bath 2, Gloucester 1,Village shop 4,Bristol 1, Swindon 2,Malmesbury 2,all goods delivered 2.Mail order catalogues were used.{Doorstep deliveries}were available for those householders who wished to use them. The items are listed below followed by the number of days per week that they are delivered. Bread 3,milk 3,coal once a fortnight, meat 1, fish 1, papers 7, laundry 1, post 6, groceries 1. {Meals }eaten were breakfast,dinner & tea.Dinner was the main meal of the day. It was meat & vegetables followed by a sweet pudding. It was eaten mid-day or evening. Food eaten mid-day was also called lunch. No resident was vegetarian.
